---
title: "package.json"

## High-level description
This is a `package.json` file for the `chownr` npm package. It provides metadata and configuration for a Node.js module that implements functionality similar to the Unix command `chown -R`, which recursively changes the owner of files and directories.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
Defines essential information about the package, including its name, version, description, and author.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| author | Isaac Z. Schlueter &lt;i@izs.me&gt; (http://blog.izs.me/) | The package author's name, email, and website |
| name | chownr | The name of the package |
| description | like `chown -R` | A brief description of the package's functionality |
| version | 1.1.4 | The current version of the package |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the type and URL of the source code repository.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| type | git | The version control system used |
| url | git://github.com/isaacs/chownr.git | The URL of the Git repository |

### Main and Files
#### Description
Defines the main entry point of the package and the files to be included when published.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| main | chownr.js | The primary entry point of the package |
| files | ["chownr.js"] | An array of files to be included in the package |

### Dependencies
#### Description
Lists the development dependencies required for testing and development.

| Dependency | Version | Description |
|:-----------|:--------|:------------|
| mkdirp | 0.3 | A library for creating directories |
| rimraf | ^2.7.1 | A library for recursive directory removal |
| tap | ^14.10.6 | A test framework for Node.js |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines npm scripts for various tasks such as testing and publishing.

| Script | Command | Description |
|:-------|:--------|:------------|
| test | tap | Runs the test suite using the tap framework |
| preversion | npm test | Runs tests before versioning |
| postversion | npm publish | Publishes the package after versioning |
| prepublishOnly | git push origin --follow-tags | Pushes changes and tags to the remote repository before publishing |

### Other Configuration
#### Description
Additional configuration options for the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| license | ISC | The license under which the package is distributed |
| tap.check-coverage | true | Enables coverage checking for the tap test framework |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| mkdirp | Used for creating directories during development or testing |
| rimraf | Used for removing directories during development or testing |
| tap | Used as the test framework for the package |

This `package.json` file provides all the necessary information for managing the `chownr` package, including its dependencies, scripts for development and publishing, and metadata for npm. The package implements functionality similar to the Unix `chown -R` command, allowing recursive ownership changes for files and directories in a Node.js environment.
